meanings.definition: A small, predatory arthropod with many legs.
meanings.sent1: Centipedes crawl quickly on the ground.
meanings.sent2: I saw centipedes hiding under the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The centipedes had a race with the ants.
meanings.sent4: The centipedes moved like a train of legs.
meanings.sent5: The sight of centipedes scurrying made me shiver.

meanings.definition: A type of invertebrate known for its long, segmented body and numerous legs.
meanings.sent1: Centipedes have many legs that help them move.
meanings.sent2: The centipedes in the garden are fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent3: The centipedes threw a leg party in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The centipedes resembled a moving puzzle of legs.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the sight of centipedes marching in a line.
